title: Monster High: The Ghouls Rule Boxed Set
description: Ghouls Rule at Monster High!Follow Rochelle Goyle, Venus McFlytrap, and Robecca Steam on their adventures with the rest of the Monster High students disembody as they solve a creeperific mystery! This hardcover boxed set Ghoulfriends Forever, Ghoulfriends Just Want To Have Fun, and Who's That Ghoulfriend?
author: Gitty Daneshvari
